title: 304 Stainless Housing
highlights: Detailed weld sequencing with fixturing concept sketches referenced.
Quality plan specifies CMM sampling (5/lot) and PFMEA linkage.
Cost levers include reusable fixture concept and nesting yield improvement.
fix_templates: Add supplier readiness checks when long-lead outsource steps exist.
Document heat-treat or finish partners when called out in the drawing.
